name: Lyra's Tale (Zaidis)
description:
============================================

Submitted to the MAGD Expo 2021! This is a Demo build.

============================================

When the Guardians have become tainted by the mysterious and dark Storm, Lyra must embark on a journey to not only uncover the secrets of her past, but also to save the lands from the Dark Lord Malgorion, who plans to use the Guardians as his puppets!
